text: The 2015–16 Dallas Mavericks season was the 36th season of the franchise in the National Basketball Association (NBA). The Mavericks finished second in the Southwest division and sixth in the Western conference with a 42–40 record. The Mavs' season ended with a 1–4 first round playoff series loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder. The Mavericks have not qualified for the playoffs until 2020. ==Key dates== * June 25: The 2015 NBA draft took place at Barclays Center in Brooklyn, New York.
